thread.title: UBC experts available for comment on World Alzheimer’s Day

author: Peter Meiszner
title: UBC experts available for comment on World Alzheimer’s Day
text:
UBC experts available for comment on World Alzheimer’s Day September 21, 2015 Credit: Flickr 
Today is World Alzheimer’s Day. The following experts are available to comment on a range of issues related to this disease. 
Dr. Julie Robillard
